front.title: Session Initiation Protocol (SIP) INFO Method and Package Framework

abstract.t: This document defines the new SIP INFO method and a mechanism for defining, negotiating and exchanging Info Packages that use the INFO method. Applications that need to exchange session-related information within a SIP INVITE-created dialog, also known as application level information, use these INFO requests. This draft addresses issues and open items from RFC 2976 and replaces it.
